pullRequest.body:
Deduce properties of `MorphismProperty.topologically P` from the respective properties stated in terms of topological spaces.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->
As far as I can tell, the naming in this file deviates from the general mathlib conventions, so I tried to follow the local pattern. But maybe we should do some renames here?

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
### PR summary

#### Import changes

No significant changes to the import graph

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ MorphismProperty.topologically_isStableUnderComposition`
`+ MorphismProperty.topologically_iso_le`
`+ MorphismProperty.topologically_propertyIsLocalAtTarget`
`+ MorphismProperty.topologically_respectsIso`
`+ propertyIsLocalAtTarget_of_morphismRestrict`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

</details>
I think they are porting errors and shouldn't be followed. It'd be great if you could fix them.

> I think they are porting errors and shouldn't be followed. It'd be great if you could fix them.

Separate PR I guess? Maybe we can split this file at the same time, I have more API lemmas to add and this file is already getting big.
Sure. The lemmas added should follow the correct naming convention though.

I think the `_of_morphismRestrict` part is un-needed. It adds little new information and the signature doesn't even contain `morphismRestrict`.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicGeometry): expand api on topological scheme morphism properties
